Loading data:

```{r}
data = read.csv("expenses.csv")
#factorising columns
data$sex = as.factor(data$sex)
data$smoker = as.factor(data$smoker)
data$region = as.factor(data$region)
head(data)
#data description
str(data)
```
Visualisation:

```{r}
library(corrplot)
#correlation Matrix
df.2 <- data[,c("age","bmi","children","charges")]
#df.2
cor_mat <- cor(df.2)
# correlation graph
corrplot(cor_mat,method = 'number')
```
Visulaising features to target (charges).
```{r}
plot(charges~.,data = data)

```
